sources.title: Black Widow 1954 Widescreen 576p
sources.description: Black Widow is a 1954 American DeLuxe Color mystery film in CinemaScope , with elements of film noir , written, produced, and directed by Nunnally Johnson , based on the 1952 novel of the same name by Patrick Quentin . The film stars Ginger Rogers , Van Heflin , Gene Tierney , and George Raft .
